# Statistics Lecture 02, 30/01/2025

## Normal Distribution

```{r setup, echo=FALSE}         
height<-c(126,178,181,167,166,164,163,189,199,201,134)
data<-data.frame(height)
#hist(height, freq=FALSE, col="red")
#lines(density(height), col="black")
x <- seq(-4, 4, length=200)
y <- dnorm(x, mean=0, sd=1)
plot(x,y, type = "l", lwd = 2, xlim = c(-3.5,3.5))
```
